problems.title: Search Element In Array
problems.description: Write a Java program to search for a given element `x` in an array of `n` integers. If the element is found, print "Found". If not found, print "Not Found".
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5
1 2 3 4 5
3

Sample Output
Found

Sample Input
5
1 2 3 4 5
6

Sample Output
Not Found
hintsList: Iterate through the array and compare each element with x.
